thread.title: Steve Ballmer Says He Owns 4% Stake in Twitter
thread.title_full: Steve Ballmer Says He Owns 4% Stake in Twitter - Bloomberg Business

author: Bloomberg.com
title: Steve Ballmer Says He Owns 4% Stake in Twitter
text:
Former Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer has built up a 4 percent stake in Twitter Inc., he said via e-mail.
The owner of the Los Angeles Clippers basketball team posted on Twitter earlier Friday that heâ€™s been impressed with recent efforts by the social-media company and new CEO Jack Dorsey to improve its focus.
